casebody.data:
David R. SHIPP and wife, Cassandra Shipp
v.
CITY OF FAYETTEVILLE, a North Carolina Municipal Corporation No. 306P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Mr. David R. Shipp, For Shipp, David R., et al. Ms. Cassandra R. Shipp, For the State. Ms. Cathryn M. Little, Attorney at Law, For City of Fayetteville.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 13th of September 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
